description: Regression Test Suite for News Cartoon Application

regression-tests.name: regression-tests
regression-tests.description: Comprehensive regression test suite for news-cartoon application

tasks.title: Set up comprehensive test infrastructure
tasks.description: Configure Vitest, React Testing Library, and test utilities for the project
tasks.details:
- Configure Vitest in vite.config.ts with jsdom environment
- Set up comprehensive test globals and mocks in src/test/setup.ts
- Create shared test utilities and custom render functions
- Configure code coverage with 80% threshold targets
- Set up test data fixtures and factory functions
- Add MSW (Mock Service Worker) for API mocking
- Configure pre-commit hooks for test running
tasks.testStrategy: Run npm test to verify all configurations work. Generate coverage report and ensure it displays correctly.

tasks.title: Create unit tests for all service modules
tasks.description: Write comprehensive unit tests for newsService, geminiService, and locationService
tasks.details:
- Test newsService: fetchNewsByLocation, fetchNewsByKeyword, caching, retry logic
- Test geminiService: generateCartoonConcepts, generateComicScript, generateCartoonImage, caching
- Test locationService: detectLocation, getLocationFromGPS, getLocationFromIP
- Mock all external API calls and browser APIs
- Test error handling, edge cases, and retry mechanisms
- Achieve 90%+ coverage for service layer
tasks.testStrategy: Each service should have its own test file. Verify all public methods are tested with various scenarios.

tasks.title: Create unit tests for all Zustand stores
tasks.description: Write comprehensive tests for cartoonStore, newsStore, locationStore, and preferencesStore
tasks.details:
- Test all store actions and state transitions
- Test localStorage persistence and hydration
- Test store reset functionality
- Test computed values and selectors
- Test error state management
- Verify store isolation and independence
tasks.testStrategy: Create separate test files for each store. Use renderHook from React Testing Library to test store hooks.

tasks.title: Create component tests for all React components
tasks.description: Write comprehensive component tests using React Testing Library
tasks.details:
- Test NewsDisplay component with various article states
- Test ConceptGenerator with concept selection flow
- Test ImageGenerator with rate limiting scenarios
- Test LocationDetector with GPS and manual entry
- Test Layout, ErrorBoundary, and navigation components
- Test loading states, error states, and user interactions
- Verify accessibility and ARIA attributes
tasks.testStrategy: Each component should have a corresponding .test.tsx file. Use userEvent for interactions.

tasks.title: Set up Playwright for E2E testing
tasks.description: Configure Playwright and create end-to-end tests for critical user journeys
tasks.details:
- Install and configure Playwright with multiple browsers
- Create E2E tests for location-based news flow
- Test keyword search and article display
- Test complete cartoon generation flow
- Test rate limiting and error recovery
- Test settings persistence across sessions
- Set up visual regression testing
- Configure parallel test execution
tasks.testStrategy: Run playwright test to verify all user flows work correctly across browsers.

tasks.title: Create API and backend tests
tasks.description: Write comprehensive tests for the Express backend server
tasks.details:
- Test /api/news/search endpoint with various queries
- Test /api/article/content scraping functionality
- Test RSS feed parsing from Google News
- Test error handling and status codes
- Test CORS configuration
- Test request validation and sanitization
- Test caching mechanisms
- Use supertest for API testing
tasks.testStrategy: Run server tests separately with npm run test:server. Verify all endpoints handle edge cases.

tasks.title: Set up CI/CD test automation
tasks.description: Configure GitHub Actions or similar CI/CD for automated testing
tasks.details:
- Create workflow for running tests on pull requests
- Set up test matrix for multiple Node versions
- Configure code coverage reporting to Codecov or similar
- Set up branch protection requiring passing tests
- Configure performance budget checks
- Add bundle size analysis
- Set up automated dependency updates with tests
tasks.testStrategy: Push changes to trigger CI/CD pipeline. Verify all checks pass and reports generate.

tasks.title: Create testing documentation and guidelines
tasks.description: Document testing strategies, patterns, and best practices for the project
tasks.details:
- Write comprehensive testing guide in docs/TESTING.md
- Document test running commands and options
- Create troubleshooting guide for common test issues
- Document mocking strategies and patterns
- Create examples of good test practices
- Document coverage goals and how to improve them
- Create contribution guidelines for test requirements
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation with team. Ensure new contributors can understand and run tests.
